predicate.note: Frames file for 'intermix' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Other ads do n't bother with the fundraising ; a touching , if self-congratulatory , American Telephone & Telegraph ad that [*T*-1] aired Sunday intermixed footage of the devastation in San Francisco and Charleston , S.C. , with interviews of people recounting how AT&T helped [*T*-2] .
example.arg: a touching , if self-congratulatory , American Telephone & Telegraph ad that [*T*-1] aired Sunday
footage of the devastation in San Francisco and Charleston , S.C. ,
with interviews of people recounting how AT&T helped [*T*-2]
